channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: This role is most likely to open door for women with CEO ambitions
item.description: Women are overrepresented in roles that rarely lead to CEO. But one title stands out as a proven springboard

item.title: Sam Altman’s eye-scanning identity tech expands to U.K.
item.description: The company has presented its eye-scanning technology as a way for people to prove they are human at a time when AI systems are becoming more adept at...

item.title: Garbage collectors are turning Africa’s largest slum into one of the world’s most bitcoin-friendly places
item.description: Bitcoin came to Soweto West via AfriBit Africa, a Kenyan fintech company, through its nonprofit initiative to improve financial inclusion.

item.title: U.K. remains Europe’s top spot for finance investment, EY says
item.description: Global investors also see London as the most attractive European city for financial services foreign investment over the coming year, according to EY.
